title.rendered: “Israeli Fighter Jets Neutralize Hezbollah Terror Targets in Lebanon: An Inside Look”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A military headquarters operated by Hezbollah terrorists and a military base from which rockets were launched at Israeli territory; fighter jets attacked and destroyed terror targets in Lebanese territory.

Shortly ago, fighter jets attacked several terror targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in Lebanon.

As part of the attack, two observation posts were attacked in spacious areas and Iaita al-Shaab next to a military headquarters in the Yaroun area, where terrorists of the organization operated and a launch pad from which rockets were launched to Israeli territory.

In addition, during the day, three launches were identified crossing from Lebanon to the territories in Ra’am and Zarit and fell in open areas, no injuries.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/47WmqrW
